name: Mental Health Technologies, Inc.
description: Mental Health Technologies, Inc. is a leader in the development of innovative software solutions aimed at improving mental health care delivery and accessibility. Founded in 2015, the company focuses on harnessing technology to create tools that support mental wellness for individuals and practitioners alike. Its flagship product, MindTrack, is a comprehensive platform designed to facilitate virtual therapy sessions, monitor patient progress, and enhance communication between therapists and clients. The platform integrates advanced data analytics and AI-driven insights to provide tailored recommendations and improve treatment outcomes. The company’s mission is to destigmatize mental health treatment and make quality care available to everyone, regardless of their location. In addition to MindTrack, Mental Health Technologies offers a range of resources, including educational materials and community support programs, to empower users in their mental health journeys. The company actively collaborates with healthcare providers, insurance companies, and academic institutions to push the boundaries of mental health care and address the growing mental health crisis worldwide.

seo.meta_title: Mental Health Technologies, Inc. | Innovative Solutions for Mental Wellness
seo.meta_description: Explore Mental Health Technologies, Inc., a pioneer in mental health care solutions. Discover our products, mission, and how we are transforming mental wellness.

faq.question: What does Mental Health Technologies, Inc. do?
faq.answer: Mental Health Technologies develops software solutions to improve mental health care delivery and accessibility.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Mental Health Technologies?
faq.answer: Dr. Lisa Nguyen is the CEO of Mental Health Technologies, Inc.

faq.question: Where is the company headquartered?
faq.answer: Mental Health Technologies is headquartered in San Francisco, California, USA.

faq.question: What are the main products offered?
faq.answer: The main products include MindTrack and Therapist Connect, along with various educational resources.

faq.question: When was the company founded?
faq.answer: Mental Health Technologies was founded in 2015.
